title: i need my pbe accounts runes reset but i dont know my original email or account
body: on the pbe client it says I have 45x runes for the runes I have and it wont let me buy anymore runes because of this, I would like to know if I can still get it reset despite not knowing my email or account linked to it. the accounts username is **[REDACTED]** if that information means anything.

replies.body:
I had to redact your username because that isn't information you want to make public since it's only used for logging into the client. If you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be happy to assist you in sorting out your runes.

Let me know if you have any questions.
